summary: Dr. Naila Marir serves as an Assistant Professor in the Computer Science Department at Effat University. She earned her PhD in Computer Science and Technology and specializes in artificial intelligence and cybersecurity. Her research is centered on Data-Centric AI, Federated Learning, and Big Data Analytics, with a strong emphasis on enhancing cybersecurity through Generative AI and Deep Learning. Dr. Marir's work advances Deep Learning techniques and their applications in Network Security, addressing critical challenges in data security and integrity. Additionally, she is dedicated to exploring Natural Language Processing and Sentiment Analysis to deepen understanding of human language for impactful real-world applications. Dr. Marir is committed to developing ethical AI solutions that prioritize privacy and security.
